info.name: WAF Detection
author: dwisiswant0
lu4nx
info.description: A web application firewall was detected.

request:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: mobilic.beta.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Content-Length: 27
Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded
Accept-Encoding: gzip

_=<script>alert(1)</script>
response:
HTTP/1.1 405 Not Allowed Connection: close Content-Length: 150 Content-Type: text/html; charset=utf-8 Date: Tue, 10 May 2022 02:48:09 GMT X-Request-Id: 1f76a8bf-a647-4a2f-a38e-c50fd11228da 405 Not Allowed

405 Not Allowed

nginx
curl-command: curl -X 'POST' -d '_=<script>alert(1)</script>' -H 'Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded' -H 'Host: mobilic.beta.gouv.fr' -H 'User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)' 'https://mobilic.beta.gouv.fr/'

info.name: DNS TXT Record Detected
author: pdteam
info.description: A DNS TXT record was detected. The TXT record lets a domain admin leave notes on a DNS server.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 51057
;; flags: rd ad; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;mobilic.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 TXT
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 51057
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 1, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 1232

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;mobilic.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 TXT

;; ANSWER SECTION:
mobilic.beta.gouv.fr.	300	IN	TXT	"v=spf1 include:_spf.alwaysdata.com ?all"

info.name: MX Record Detection
author: pdteam
info.description: An MX record was detected. MX records direct emails to a mail exchange server.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 40404
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;mobilic.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 MX
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 40404
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 2, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 512

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;mobilic.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 MX

;; ANSWER SECTION:
mobilic.beta.gouv.fr.	300	IN	MX	10 mx1.alwaysdata.com.
mobilic.beta.gouv.fr.	300	IN	MX	20 mx2.alwaysdata.com.

request:
POST /api/graphql HTTP/1.1
Host: mobilic.beta.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Content-Length: 67
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Content-Type: application/json
Accept-Encoding: gzip

{"query":"query IntrospectionQuery{__schema {queryType { name }}}"}
response:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Connection: close
Content-Length: 54
Access-Control-Allow-Origin: *
Cache-Control: no-cache; max-age=0
Content-Security-Policy: object-src 'self'; connect-src 'self' https://client.crisp.chat https://api-adresse.data.gouv.fr https://*.ingest.sentry.io wss://client.relay.crisp.chat https://stats.data.gouv.fr; base-uri 'self'; default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' https://client.crisp.chat https://stats.data.gouv.fr; img-src 'self' data: https://client.crisp.chat https://stats.data.gouv.fr; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://client.crisp.chat; font-src 'self' https://client.crisp.chat; frame-src https://metabase.mobilic.beta.gouv.fr https://www.youtube.com https://www.slideshare.net
Content-Type: application/json
Date: Tue, 10 May 2022 02:50:04 GMT
Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=31536000; includeSubDomains
X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff
X-Frame-Options: deny
X-Request-Id: 393be0dd-5af2-4e5a-a131-51494c31d841
X-Request-Id: 393be0dd-5af2-4e5a-a131-51494c31d841
X-Xss-Protection: 1; mode=block

{"data":{"__schema":{"queryType":{"name":"Queries"}}}}
curl-command: curl -X 'POST' -d '{"query":"query IntrospectionQuery{__schema {queryType { name }}}"}' -H 'Accept: */*' -H 'Accept-Language: en' -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -H 'User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)' 'https://mobilic.beta.gouv.fr/api/graphql'

info.name: NS Record Detection
author: pdteam
info.description: An NS record was detected. An NS record delegates a subdomain to a set of name servers.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 36270
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;mobilic.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 NS
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 36270
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 2, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 1232

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;mobilic.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 NS

;; ANSWER SECTION:
mobilic.beta.gouv.fr.	300	IN	NS	dns1.alwaysdata.com.
mobilic.beta.gouv.fr.	300	IN	NS	dns2.alwaysdata.com.
